articles.title: TCL starts selling Android-powered TVs in the US - Yahoo Finance Australia
articles.description: TCL is giving US customers more choice by shipping Android TV-based sets.
articles.content: You no longer have to use Rokus platform if you want a modern TCL TV in the US. TCL has started selling its Android TV-based 3-Series sets in the US through Best Buy. You can buy a 32-inch, 720p star… [+657 chars]
